sources.title: Moonlight for Two (1932)
sources.description: Moonlight for Two is a 1932 Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies cartoon directed by Rudolf Ising. The short was released on June 11, 1932, and stars Goopy Geer, one of the few recurring characters in the early Merrie Melodies series. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/moonlight-for-two-1932/

metadata.Plot: Two dogs, courting, go to a dance. On the way, they ride a buckboard that crashes and becomes a wheelbarrow. At the dance, a bear with a shotgun causes trouble, but with some help from a walking stove, our hero fends him off.
metadata.Actors: Marcellite Garner, Rudolf Ising, The King's Men
